forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of rain before 4am, then rain and areas of fog. Cloudy, with a low around 43. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Patchy Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and patchy fog before 11am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain between 11am and 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 49. Northwest wind 3 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dawn approaches in Boston, an enveloping cloak of fog settles over the city, accompanied by the gentle promise of rain. The atmosphere is thick with a tapestry of muted grays and shadowy outlines, evoking a sense of stillness and mystery. With temperatures resting around a cool 43 degrees, a modest southeast wind stirs, whispering softly through the streets. The chance of rain dances around a suave 80 percent, hinting at the onset of gentle showers that may tend to linger throughout the early hours.

As the day unfolds, expect the fog to persist, mingling with the rain until late morning, when the clouds will remain, casting a somber veil over the landscape. The high will inch toward a crisp 49, and gusts may gustily remind one of the weather's fickleness. Attire that welcomes layering would be wise—perhaps a light raincoat paired with a cozy sweater beneath—bringing both comfort and modulation against the cool, damp air. With the ambiance suggesting a day best spent indoors, one might relish the simple joy of curling up with a book in a favorite nook or indulging in a warm cup of coffee at a local café, letting the world outside blur into a watercolor of muted colors and soft sounds, reverberating with the quietude of a rainy day in this storied city.
